Steam wants me to write a review so I can get summer sale points

A game that stands the test of time.
A great little challenge but worth it in the end.
Might be a bit confusing at first but one reminder that I can give you:
Search every room and every passage way. It *definitely* helps!
Juste le meilleur jeu sur la planète, on peut débattre sur la galaxie.
Game doesn't suck I don't go to bed
A great game for those who enjoy the classics
гайд о том как отметить нг

Che dire... Half-Life è il primo gioco serio a cui abbia mai giocato da bambino e ancora oggi non mi ha stancato per niente.
Adoro modificare i modelli e rimpiazzarli a mio piacimento e aggiungere mod per prolungare il gioco.
L'unica pecca è l'assenza della funzione "rollangle", presente in Half-Life Uplink, ma per il resto stra consiglio questo titolo. 
Se non avete Half-Life nella vostra libreria affrettatevi e compratelo prima che finiscano i saldi!!!
Нестареющая классика! Отличная игра, даже спустя 20 лет после выпуска!
I played for the first time in 2000 and expend a lot of hours playing it... love it.
As old as it is, the game still holds up today. It's graphics albeit dated, still has a decent story
Good game helped me forget how depressing my childhood was

One of the most revolutionary games of its time. Valve really experimented with a bunch of new features. The AI of all NPC's is still impressive, even after 20 years. It also introduced enviromental storytelling to a generation of gamers. Even though, now the graphics are pretty dated, Half-Life still manages to maintain its unique charm.
I love this game. I heard it was good and i said fuck it ill get it and it brings retro nostalgia
Adrenaline Gamer y HL nostalgia pura
A true classic that everyone should play eventually. Its a classic for a reason, and while the graphics are from the 1990's, the game still stands great against the sands of time.

This game may not have aged well, but it sure as hell still remains a classic in my book. If I was born around the period when this undeniable diamond came out, I would I have gotten this game along with any type of merch I could get my hands on.

If you haven't played Half Life yet, I suggest you do.

Solid 10/10. The best FPS of it's time.

one of my all time favorites
good game yes
The only game where you can have Terrorists, Spongebob, furries, and sandbox funtime at the same time
Ótimo jogo! É uma pena que a valve não sabe contar até 3 pra lançar o próximo...
quando mi dicevano che era il più bel gioco di sempre pensavo esagerassero, invece nonostante l'età sta diventando il mio gioco preferito
[Review written because Steam told me to write a review.]
First game I have ever played, and I'm glad that's how I got introduced into PC Games
This will always be a classic
um dos melhores fps que já joguei, eu recomendo que compre.

eh you know what most people know about half life so what's the point of putting an actual good review about this game.
Yeah it's pretty good go buy it.
While some puzzles are a little too cryptic and some areas aren't made very well, it is a true classic in gaming all should try
this game is a classic and everyone should play it at least once. the only thing it's missing is a multiplayer mode

Пфф, это просто легенда. Мало кто о ней не знает, но всё же, я отмечу плюсы и минусы игры для непросветлённых. 
Игра вышла в 1998 году (если не ошибаюсь). Минусы: много багов, физику, конечно, никто уже не исправит, русский язык не поддерживается. Графика не является недочётом, это, скорее привет из тех времён, который напоминает, как когда то эта игра потрясла мир. Плюсы: неповторимый сюжет, который является началом всей истории данной вселенной и который никакими словами ни опишешь, ну и механика боя (для тех времён). Я в курсе, что в 2019 году обзор на игру 20-ти летней давности уже не актуален, ну и пофиг. Что же, своих денег игра стоит. Всем приятной игры!

Definitely a worthy game to buy! ( on sales or even full price )
I had many hours playing this game non-steam , i never regretted playing it!
Un clasico, una joya pura uwu
a game that show us the events and the start of the half-life game history and tons of shitty spins off after this.
muy buen juego me recuerda a mi infancia cuando lo jugaba, recomendado xd

One of the best games of all time. I have no nostalgia for this game; I played it for the first time in 2016 at around 14 years old. But I cannot stress enough that this is an amazing game!
